sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes>58d17acf0b531010a8b1c96237673a68</includes><macroponent display_value="Manager">345a8a7293c512102b267fbcebba1039</macroponent><name>Open Record from List</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, helpers, event, imports}) {
    /* const { buildDefaultRoutePayload
    } = imports["global.recordRoutesMapping"]();

    var route = 'record';
    var targetRoute = '';

    const defaultRoutePayload = buildDefaultRoutePayload(route, targetRoute, event);
 
    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', defaultRoutePayload); */

    api.emit('NAV_ITEM_SELECTED', {
        "route": "record",
        "fields": {
            table: "incident",
            sysId: "-1",
        }
    });
 }]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>leandro.lopes</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-10-08 17:27:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>ebb15aba93c512102b267fbcebba1038</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Open Record from List</sys_name><sys_package display_value="My Widgets" source="x_821667_my_widget">3d3b07fe971121109fd237971153affc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="My Widgets">3d3b07fe971121109fd237971153affc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_ebb15aba93c512102b267fbcebba1038</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>leandro.lopes</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-10-08 18:09:23</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
